case.title: White gent looking for black chick - 44 (Central London)
case.text: White, tall, handsome, dark blonde hair, professional, have love & positiveness inside me and a taste for good things (food + wine + drink) I can accommodate , Hope to meet you soon a lovely girl for dating. This is a genuine advert, please reply with a photo, next would be to meet up for a drink as I am not into emails etc ... One last thing I do not mind if you are in relationship, I will keep it discreet anyway. Thanks for reading p.s no escorts, no agencies or alike
